It's an emotionally charged movie that beautifully portrays the struggle for freedom.

If you're interested in something more modern, "300: Rise of an Empire" might be up your alley too! This spin-off from the original 300 film features a stellar cast including Sullivan Stapleton and Eva Green, and delves into the naval battles between Greece and Persia during the same era.
